column5: At the bottom of the forum on the left side was an link to "mark discussions read". It no longer appears on my computer. Now all posts appear as new unless you actually open them.  (Never mind I just found where it's been relocated to.)
OK I give, where is it Woodsman? Like finding Waldo.
OK I give, where is it Woodsman? Like finding Waldo.  Top right beside the start new topic tab.
There it is, thanks. Now how does one use it. I'm a bit slow today, got smacked upside the head with a bottle of Smirnoff's finest last evening.
You click on it and it will mark all of the topics as read. Makes it easy to see which topics have new posts.
same place it always was but just a bit invisible , if you use the earth,,whatever its called skin
The "Mark Comunity Read" tab has now reappeared at the bottom left of the page.
